sentences.sContent: Towards evening, the sun from the clouds like scale again put a painting like luster.
sentences.sContent_eng: Towards evening, the sun from the clouds like scale again put a painting like luster.
sentences.sCn: 临近傍晚，阳光从鱼鳞般的云层中一次次投放出油画般的光彩。

sentences.sContent: The childishness of juvenile had just faded from his face and the adolescent luster of his age had not been coruscating due to apparent malnutrition.
sentences.sContent_eng: The childishness of juvenile had just faded from his face and the adolescent luster of his age had not been coruscating due to apparent malnutrition.
sentences.sCn: 脸上看来才刚刚褪掉少年的稚气——显然由于营养不良，还没有焕发出他这种年龄所特有的那种青春光彩。

sentences.sContent: Turning turning, and we go to the garment district, one of my eyes saw the clothes release luster, so I immediately plunged into the sea of clothing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Turning turning, and we go to the garment district, one of my eyes saw the clothes release luster, so I immediately plunged into the sea of clothing.
sentences.sCn: 转着转着，我们转到了服装区，一看见衣服我的眼睛就放出光彩，于是我立刻钻进衣服的海洋里。

words.tran: 表面有金属光泽的陶瓷器
